articles.title: Iranian missiles slam into Israel as huge explosions rock Tehran.
articles.description: Tensions escalate as Iran launches missiles into Israel, causing significant explosions in Tehran. This follows earlier strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities.

articles.title: US claims strikes on Iran nuclear sites caused 'severe damage,' but full impact is unclear.
articles.description: The United States asserts that its strikes on Iranian nuclear sites have inflicted severe damage; however, the full extent of the impact remains uncertain. This action has heightened alarm in the region.

articles.title: Assembly bypoll results: People rejected both BJP and Congress, says Arvind Kejriwal after AAP's victory.
articles.description: Arvind Kejriwal states that the public has rejected both the BJP and Congress parties following the AAPs victory in the Assembly bypoll results.
